edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene
Class NeuronMorphologyView

java.lang.Object
  Node
      edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene.TangibleView
          edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene.NeuronMorphologyView

public class NeuronMorphologyView
extends TangibleView

Visualizes a neuron morphology. Describes the 3D structure of a biological object in a format that can be easily visualized in a 3D viewer (X3D?) Need to implement selection handlers. One click should select a segment, while a double-click should select the whole cell

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu)
See Also:
NeuronMorphology
